verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>speaketh<s%> <S%G4490>expressly<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5306>latter<s%> <S%G2540>times<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> shall depart <S%G868>from<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>, giving <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G4108>seducing<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> of <S%G1140>devils<s%>;

<S%G2967>Forbidding<s%> to <S%G1060>marry<s%>, and commanding to abstain <S%G567>from<s%> <S%G1033>meats<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> be <S%G3336>received<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> of them which <S%G4103>believe<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1921>know<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2938>creature<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2570>good<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> to be <S%G579>refused<s%>, if it be <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%>:

If thou <S%G5294>put<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> in <S%G5294>remembrance<s%> of these <S%G5023>things<s%>, thou shalt <S%G2071>be<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, nourished <S%G1789>up<s%> in the <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%>, <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> thou hast <S%G3877>attained<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4984>bodily<s%> <S%G1129>exercise<s%> <S%G2076%G5624>profiteth<s%> <S%G4314%G3641>little<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5624>profitable<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G2222>life<s%> that now <S%G3568>is<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of that which is to <S%G3195>come<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1519%G5124>therefore<s%> <S%G2872>we<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G2872>labour<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> suffer <S%G3679>reproach<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> we <S%G1679>trust<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4990>Saviour<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G3122>specially<s%> of those that <S%G4103>believe<s%>.

<S%G272>Neglect<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G5486>gift<s%> that is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> the laying <S%G1936>on<s%> of the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of the <S%G4244>presbytery<s%>.

Take <S%G1907>heed<s%> unto <S%G4572>thyself<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> unto the <S%G1319>doctrine<s%>; <S%G1961>continue<s%> in <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> thou <S%G4982>shalt<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> them that <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>.
